ProjectClass module

class ProjectClass.Project(ProjectName, WorkingDir, LaTeXClass)[source]

Bases: object

This a class to define the properties of a LaTeX project. It relies on functions defined in SettingsClass.Settings and InteractFunc.py.

Parameters

  • ProjectName (str) – Name of the project that will be treated.

  • WorkingDir – Path to the folder where the project is located or where

it will be created :type WorkingDir: str :param LaTeXClass: Class associated with the main file of the project. It must be a supported class (ie detailled in settings.json), checks are done to verify that. :type LaTeXClass: str

CheckClass() → bool[source]

Check if LaTeXClass is a supported LaTeX document class.

Returns

True if it is a supported class, false if not.

Return type

bool

CheckInit() → bool[source]

Check if the project can be initialized in the folder specified in Project.WorkingDir and if the LaTeX dependencies detailled in settings.json are correct by searching in the main TeX file for correct include statements.

Returns

True if the project can be safely initialized, False if not.

Return type

bool

ClassList = ['beamer', 'standard', 'fiche']
CreateProject(images=True, pptx=False)[source]

Create of project according to the information given in ProjectClass.Project.

Parameters

  • images (bool, optional) – Create an images folder, defaults to True

  • pptx – Create a .pptx file inside the images folder to create figures

  • currently not implemented, defaults to False

PathToSource = '/home/nlesquoy/ghq/LaTeX-Project-Manager/source_TeX'
RemoveProject()[source]

Delete a specified Project. This function is likely to be moved to InteractFunc.py

SettingsInit = <SettingsClass.Settings object>
